P01_floor_sum_divisibility.canonical_theme: Count alpha in [0,B] such that sum_{k=1}^n floor(k alpha) is divisible by n for all n

P02_checkerboard_balanced_trails.canonical_theme: Minimum number of monotone trails to partition checkerboard grid

P03_functional_equation_disjointness.canonical_theme: Same functional-equation skeleton where equality characterizes disjointness/coprimality, then count derived objects

P04_grid_rectangles_with_permutation_hol.canonical_theme: Partition n x n grid minus one cell per row/column into minimum axis-aligned rectangles

P05_three_largest_proper_divisors_iterat.canonical_theme: Iterate psi(N)=sum of 3 largest proper divisors; count initial values with infinite well-defined sequence

P06_triangular_lattice_lines_attainable_.canonical_theme: Cover triangular lattice points with n lines; classify attainable number of non-standard lines

P07_eventually_periodic_real_sequence.canonical_theme: Sequence with recurrence + square-summable increments + eventual periodicity; maximize number of distinct values

P08_distinct_consecutive_distances_route.canonical_theme: Permutation route on 1..2N-1 with all consecutive distances distinct; minimize max(endpoint values)

P09_increasing_sequence_distinct_gaps.canonical_theme: Strictly increasing integer sequence with pairwise distinct gaps and bound on two-step differences; maximize length

P10_parameterized_geometry_uniqueness.canonical_theme: Parameterized geometry setup where exactly one parameter value satisfies the target tangency/angle identity
